mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Kelley, Benjamin Franklin to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Kelley, Benjamin Franklin
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Pierpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling May 19 1862. By Telegraph from Clarksburg 19 1862. Just arrived have been Eight (8) days in the Saddle but have Stood in the Labor about as well as any of my officers or men = Have Dispersed the Guerillas but unfortunately have not been able to capture them = what is the news-did you get my Dispatch Some days Since BF Kelly Brig Genl 49D154pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Kelley, Benjamin Franklin
Clarksburg, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
